abstract: No Steve Jobs, but a brand new iPhone took the stage during the Worldwide Developer’s Conference in San Francisco.
snippet: No Steve Jobs, but a brand new iPhone took the stage during the Worldwide Developer’s Conference in San Francisco.
lead_paragraph: Update | 4:51 p.m.  Clearing up some reader confusion about the price of the phones for AT&T current customers at the end of this post.

headline.main: iPhone Picks Up Speed with 3G S

abstract: AT&T says it will support all the new features of Apple’s new iPhone.
snippet: AT&T says it will support all the new features of Apple’s new iPhone.
lead_paragraph: There were titters and Twitters from the crowd at Apple’s Worldwide Developers Conference today when Apple seemed to suggest that AT&T, its exclusive carrier in the United States, was delaying its support for two new features in the iPhone’s new software: tethering and MMS.

headline.main: AT&T: Tethering and MMS Coming to the iPhone
